title: 'If turban, bangles are allowed, why target hijab alone?': Petitioners ask Karnataka HC - The Indian Express
content:
1. 'If turban, bangles are allowed, why target hijab alone?': Petitioners ask Karnataka HC  The Indian Express
  2. "What About Ghoongat, Turban, Cross?": Hijab Case In Karnataka High Court  NDTV
  3. Karnataka Education Minister Asks Schools To Give Empty Classrooms To Students Change Dresses  India Today
  4. What the hijab ban is really about  The Indian Express
  5. Why PFI-linked Campus Front of India Sprawling across Schools is An Alarming Affair  News18
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The advocate for petitioners also argued that the discrimination is even starker because there is no prescribed uniform for students in pre-university colleges in the state and as a consequence there is no rule that imposes a ban on the hijab.
